name: Dash Cancel
description:
This game is a work in progress, expect more content for the future.

Dash Cancel is a platformer based on using unique movement mechanics such as ground dashes, air dashes, walljumps, and ceiling crawls. The difficulty of the game ramps up exponentially as more mechanics are required to be used and combined in interesting ways in order to complete each level.

Controls:

W: Jump
A/D: Move
Space: Dash

You can buffer jump by holding up, but you can't buffer dash.

You can walljump at the apex of your jump but ONLY the apex of your jump.

Hold jump and towards a wall to climb the wall quickly.

Coyote-Time is implemented and extends to being able to jump after a dash off a platform.

You only get 1 jump and 1 dash per air-time, so make them count!
